title: Confirm correct messaging for: MLBN
custom_preconds:
1.User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2.User should Login with a valid account that is NOT TV-entitled
and there are live Postseason TV feeds available
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App
2. User should navigate to Games
3. Select the Postseason game 

WHEN the user is not entitled to MLBN
custom_expected:
THEN user should see Blackout message either as short message or Long message.

Long Message: Eligible MLB.TV subscribers must receive MLB Network through a participating Pay TV provider to watch the 2021 Postseason LIVE in the U.S. Authentication is required. To link your MLB.TV account to a participating pay TV provider, visit mlb.tv/postseason. Live audio and full game archives are available with a valid MLB.TV subscription 90 minutes after the conclusion of the game.

Short message: Eligible MLB.TV subscribers must receive MLB Network through a participating Pay TV provider to watch the 2021 Postseason LIVE in the U.S. Authentication is required. To link your MLB.TV account to a participating pay TV provider, visit mlb.tv/postseason.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1J3l8-gCMntIZbnFOMqprbevFOVaa-dHpf3AyNKCVyZE/edit#gid=960536641

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon in the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be presented with the day's TV feeds

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps a live US Feed for any of the participating networks
(TBS, FS1, FOX, MLBN)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted that "At Bat wants to use 'mlb.com' to sign in"

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Continue" from the prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview where they can select their cable provider from a drop-down

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects their cable provider from the drop down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the provider login page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enters valid cable provider credentials that include the network package
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is deeplinked back to the app and the feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs back to the TV EPG
and selects a live Postseason feed from the same network they auth'd for
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be able to successfully launch the feed

title: Media Player: Display Time
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. User should Login with the valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Game option

WHEN the user selects Games option in Top Nav.
WHEN the user selects any game.

title: Verify Hide Scores ON ->Game Tile
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. User should Login with a valid account (Annual / Monthly)
3. Ensure the Hides Scores is 'ON'
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Scores
3. User navigates to Games page

When the user selects Game Tile
custom_expected:
THEN for a scheduled game, when hide scores are on, I should only see the two teams and the game start time.

THEN for a live game, when hide scores are on, I can see the two teams and text indicating the game is live.

THEN for a live blacked out game, when hide scores are on I can see the blackout market flag, the live audio pill, the two teams and the live text

THEN for a final game, when hide scores are on, I should see the two teams, and Final Text.

THEN the Scores should be hidden.

title: Homepage- Featured Game
custom_preconds:

2. User should Login with the valid account
custom_steps:

2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Home option

WHEN the user selects Homepage game.
WHEN the user selects Featured game
custom_expected:
THEN user should see 
* Live: Has a ‘Watch Live’ button if available and entitled. ‘Listen live’ if audio only.
* Archived game: Has a ‘Watch Recap’ and ‘Watch Full Game’ button
* Free game of the day flag
* Blacked out game / audio only - with appropriate flags

Note: Note that the Recap and Archive is often not available until 30 - 90 mins after the game. The button should not display while the recap/ game is not available. We need to check the end game milestone to know if the game has ended and gone to slate.

title: Homepage: Scrolling Vertically
custom_preconds:

2. User should Login with the valid account
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Home option

WHEN the user scrolls up and down.
custom_expected:
THEN user should see the below feature

|| WHEN the user selects Down arrow on the remote|THEN user should jump down to the next carousel in the first video position.  
|| WHEN the user selects UP arrow on the remote | THEN user should jump up to the next row of game carousel in the current position on the row.    
|| WHEN the user scroll down the page | THEN the user cannot view the Nav/Header/calendar   
|| WHEN the user scrolled right or left horizontally on a carousel |THEN the user should maintain the position and navigate up and down from there.  
|| WHEN the user press the * on the remote | THEN the user should jump up to the header with the cursor on the menu item of the current page the user is on. 
|| Homepage screen focus | Homepage screen, always return focus to the top.The first feature button if available if no button then focus on the NAV bar.

title: Authenticated->Deep-linking -> Verify entitled user is able to Link directly into a VOD Game
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. User should Login with the valid account
3. User should select the Deeplink from the Home page OR
4. Set the Deep link in your laptop. 
See the instruction in the below 
confluence page: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/JTS/Roku+Deep+Linking+Testing.

If the tester don't have to access to confluence page then use the below google sheet for reference.
Google sheet: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TLlu8NluF2Jyq0gz_Ln9Reyau4l858p7/view?usp=sharing

OR follow the below steps:
1. Set the Deep link in your laptop.
2. Navigate to:  http://devtools.web.roku.com/DeepLinkingTester
3. Give the IP address and click Add button.
4. Navigate to roku_deeplinking_tester and select the MLB app.
Select the Media Type and give the ID 631550
WHEN deeplink is created with valid content ID  and click sent
example:
631550
WHEN deeplink is created with valid content ID
custom_steps:
WHEN deeplink is created with valid content ID  

example: 631550 (RECAP VOD content)

AND deeplink is sent to device
custom_expected: THEN the app should launch and user should see the asset playing with no issues.

title: Homepage- Featured Game
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. User should Login with the valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Home option

WHEN the user selects Homepage game.
WHEN the user selects Featured game
custom_expected:
THEN user should see 
* Live: Has a ‘Watch Live’ button if available and entitled. ‘Listen live’ if audio only.
* Archived game: Has a ‘Watch Recap’ and ‘Watch Full Game’ button
* Free game of the day flag
* Blacked out game / audio only - with appropriate flags

Note: Note that the Recap and Archive is often not available until 30 - 90 mins after the game. The button should not display while the recap/ game is not available. We need to check the end game milestone to know if the game has ended and gone to slate.
